Register your Application

To begin using this API, you need to register your application with Tangoe. Please contact us at: XXXXXXX@tangoe.com [** ASK BECKY FOR CONTACT EMAIL â€“ OR, USE SALESFORCE FORM? (pardot.com) **].

Once your application is registered, a client ID and client secret will be provided. This ID and secret are used to obtain a personalized access token that must be passed with every API call.

Next, simply follow our easy tutorial to see how you can make your first call in just minutes.
